text:
@NikkiHaley Noticed u didn't include DOMESTIC VIOLENCE @NikkiHaley. Is it because nearly HALF of all police officers abuse their domestic partners? I guess that doesn't fit your narrative. 

FYI - the WORLD has seen an increase in violence due to COVID19, NOT because of defunding the police.
